alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:41PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Clay, Archer and Baylor Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 841 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Bellevue to near Windthorst to near Archer City to 5 miles west of Lake Kickapoo to 5 miles southwest of Lake Kemp. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Henrietta, Seymour, Archer City, Holliday, Scotland, Windthorst, Bellevue, Megargel, Lake Arrowhead, Lake Diversion, Dundee, Westover, Bluegrove, Lake Kemp, Mabelle, Mankins, Lake Kickapoo, Newport, Shannon, and Joy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
